text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Ranganathaswamy Temple, Srirangam: Thai car festival, Namperumal purappadu from kannadi arai, 4.15 a.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 4.30 a.m.; purappadu in Simha vaganam 5.15 a.m.; purappadu in Tholukiniyan, 8 a.m.; reaching Karuthurai Mandapam, 8.30 a.m.; purappadu from the mandapam, 4.30 p.m.; purappadu in Yali vaganam from vagana mandapam, 6.30 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 9.15 p.m.

Arulmigu Mariamman Temple, Samayapuram: Thai poosam festival, Amman thiruveedhi ula in pallakku, 10 a.m.; abishekam, 5 p.m.; maha deeparadhana, 7 p.m.; Amman thiruveedhi ula in Mara Bhootha vaganam, 8 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Venugopalan Sannidhi, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.; 122, South Chithra Street, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 58, Vinayagar Street, Amman Nagar, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Karivaradan Kainkarya Sabha and Srirangam Educational Society: Painting exhibition on Sri Ramanujar, V.S. Mahal, Keezha Adayavalanjan Street, Srirangam, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Tiruchi Trekkes: Certificate distribution and video presentation of Himalayan trek team to Kedarkanta Peak, Dr. A. Zameer Pasha, chief guest, Hotel Grand Gardenia, 6.30 p.m.

Tiruchi Arivalar Peravai: S. Thenmozhi, deputy commissioner, Commercial Taxes, and N. Sathammai Priya, faculty, Cauvery College for Women, speaks on Feminism in Today’s Society, Sri Sivananda Balalaya, Ramalinga Nagar South, 10.30 a.m.

Department of Information and Public Relations: Government exhibition, St. John’s Vestry Anglo-Indian Higher Secondary School grounds, 4 p.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
